data.name: Cryometeor
data.description: Considered a neutral unit. Inherits <color=#f26c1c>200%</color> of the summoner's attack. After being attacked, it moves continuously in the opposite direction from the attacker until it hits an obstacle. If it is not attacked, it charges toward random targets. If it collides with an obstacle, it deals AoE <color=#42cce0>Freeze damage</color> equal to <color=#f26c1c>300%</color> of attack to all targets within  <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of itself, and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>. If it collides with another <color=#3487e0>Cryometeor</color>, they fuse together into a <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>. Dies after collision.

data.name: Cryometeor
data.description: Considered a neutral unit. Inherits <color=#f26c1c>200%</color> of the summoner's attack. After being attacked, it moves continuously in the opposite direction from the attacker until it hits an obstacle. If it is not attacked, it charges toward random targets. If it collides with an obstacle, it deals AoE <color=#42cce0>Freeze damage</color> equal to <color=#f26c1c>300%</color> of attack to all targets within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of itself, and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>. If it collides with another <color=#3487e0>Cryometeor</color>, they fuse together into a <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>. Dies after colliding <color=#f26c1c>3 times</color>.

data.name: Megacryometeor
data.description: Considered a neutral unit. Inherits <color=#f26c1c>300%</color> of the summoner's attack. After being attacked, it moves continuously in the opposite direction from the attacker until it hits an obstacle. If it is not attacked, it charges toward random targets. If it collides with an obstacle, it deals AoE <color=#42cce0>Freeze damage</color> equal to <color=#f26c1c>300%</color> of attack to all targets within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of itself, and apply <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>. Dies after collision.

data.name: Megacryometeor
data.description: Considered an allied unit. Inherits <color=#f26c1c>400%</color> of the summoner's attack. At the end of this unit's action, it charges toward random enemy units. If it collides with an obstacle, it deals AoE <color=#42cce0>Freeze damage</color> equal to <color=#f26c1c>300%</color> of attack to all targets within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of itself, and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>. Dies after colliding <color=#f26c1c>3 times</color>.

data.name: Frostgorge Tile
data.description: When attacking enemy units on this tile, critical rate is increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color> and Freeze damage taken is increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>. Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color> to enemy units which end their action on it. Applies <color=#42cce0>Freeze</color> weakness to enemy units on it. Considered a Freeze terrain tile.

data.name: Turbocharge
data.description: When allied units deal Burn damage or out-of-turn damage, gains <color=#f26c1c>1 point</color> of energy.

data.name: Pyroclasm I
data.description: Applies <color=#e67129>Burn</color> weakness to enemy units on it. Burn damage dealt to them is increased by <color=#f26c1c>25%</color>, defense is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>15%</color> and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to enemy units which end their action on it. For allied units on this tile, their damage dealt is increased by <color=#f26c1c>25%</color> and defense is increased by <color=#f26c1c>15%</color>. If they are a Burn-element Doll, their attack is further increased by <color=#f26c1c>25%</color> and Burn damage dealt is further increased by <color=#f26c1c>15%</color>. Considered a Burn terrain tile.

data.name: Caelum Cadit
data.description: Deal AoE <color=#e67129>Burn damage</color> to all enemy units on the battlefield equal to <color=#f26c1c>500%</color> of attack and deal additional fixed damage to the target equal to  (<color=#3487e0>{0}</color>)<color=#f26c1c>stacks x0.3%</color> of the target's Max HP.

data.name: Pyroclasm II
data.description: Applies <color=#e67129>Burn</color> weakness to enemy units on it. Burn damage dealt to them is increased by <color=#f26c1c>45%</color>, defense is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>, and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to enemy units which end their action on it. For allied units on this tile, their damage dealt is increased by <color=#f26c1c>45%</color> and defense is increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>. If they are a Burn-element Doll, their attack is further increased by <color=#f26c1c>45%</color> and Burn damage dealt is further increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>. Considered a Burn terrain tile.

data.name: Pyroclasm III
data.description: Applies <color=#e67129>Burn</color> weakness to enemy units on it. Burn damage dealt to them is increased by <color=#f26c1c>75%</color>, defense is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>45%</color> and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to enemy units which end their action on it. For allied units on this tile, their damage dealt is increased by <color=#f26c1c>75%</color> and defense is increased by <color=#f26c1c>45%</color>. If they are a Burn-element Doll, their attack is further increased by <color=#f26c1c>75%</color> and Burn damage dealt is further increased by <color=#f26c1c>45%</color>. Considered a Burn terrain tile.

data.name: Toxocyte
data.description: Attacks with various summons. Its summons instantly die after attacking. Immune to damage, control and Command Prohibition effects..

data.name: Enhanced Morass
data.description: Deals fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>20%</color> of the creator's attack to enemy units that end their action on it. Applies <color=#8679e8>Corrosion</color> weakness to enemy units on it. At the start of each turn, <color=#3487e0>Morass</color> tiles will spread <color=#f26c1c>1 tile</color> in each direction. Considered a Corrosion terrain tile.

data.name: Erosion
data.description: Deals targeted <color=#8679e8>Corrosion Damage</color> equal to <color=#f26c1c>200%</color> of attack to the target.

data.name: Tumorhynchus
data.description: Inherits <color=#f26c1c>20%</color> of the summoner's max HP. Cannot move or attack. When it takes <color=#8679e8>Corrosion Damage</color>, it deals fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of the damage taken to its summoner.

data.name: Humidity
data.description:
When Humidity reaches <color=#f26c1c>60</color>, all units take fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>15%</color> of their initial max HP at the end of the round. 
When Humidity reaches <color=#f26c1c>120</color>, all units' max HP is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>. 
When Humidity reaches <color=#f26c1c>180</color>, all units' defense is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color> and attack is increased by <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>.

data.name: Incineration
data.description: Inflicts Burn weakness to enemy units within the area. Inflicts <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> to enemy units that remain within the area at the end of their action, lasting 2 turns. Considered a Burn tile.

data.name: Toxic Mist
data.description: Inflicts <color=#8679e8>Corrosion</color> weakness to enemy units within the area. Deals fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>50%</color> of the Inflictor's attack and inflicts <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to enemy units that remain within the area at the end of their action. Lasting <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Considered a Corrosion tile.

data.name: Backwash
data.description: Applies <color=#2caadb>Hydro</color> weakness to enemy units within the area. Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to allied units who end their turn within the area for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Hydro tile.

data.name: Extra Action
data.description: Can move multiple times in an allied turn.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: Units affected by Taunt attempt to move toward the unit which applied the effect and attack it.

data.name: Out of Hand
data.description: Units affected by Lost Control attempt to move away from the unit which applied the effect and stand by.

data.name: Assist
data.description: If an enemy unit attempts an attack within this unit's attack range or within a specific area, perform an attack on the enemy unit.

data.name: Counterattack
data.description: If attacked by an enemy unit within this unit's attack range or within a specific area, perform an attack on the enemy unit.

data.name: Pursuit
data.description: If an enemy unit attempts to move within this unit's attack range or within a specific area, perform an attack on the enemy unit.

data.name: Surveillance
data.description: Lock onto 1 enemy unit. If the unit attempts to move, perform an attack on the enemy unit. If an enemy unit under the effects of Surveillance is attacked in this way, remove that status.

data.name: Convert
data.description: After dealing damage to an enemy target, heal for a percentage of that damage.

data.name: Self-Destruct
data.description: After HP reaches 0, deal damage to all units within a radius around self.

data.name: Self-Repair
data.description: Recover HP of self at the end of the turn.

data.name: Vulnerable
data.description: Damage taken increases.

data.name: Air Dominance
data.description: If this unit is a flying unit, it is not affected by terrain effects while moving and is not protected by terrain effects when attacked.

data.name: Electric Shock
data.description: Units affected by Electric Shock deal damage to allied units within 1.5 tiles at the end of their action and apply Electric Shock to them.

data.name: Movement Denied
data.description: Units affected by Movement Denied cannot move but can perform basic attacks and active skills.

data.name: Stun
data.description: Units affected by Stun cannot take any action.

data.name: Attack Failed
data.description: Units affected by Attack Denied cannot do anything apart from moving or standing by.

data.name: Hot Zone
data.description: If a tile has a damaging effect, enemy units that enter it will lose a portion of their maximum HP at the end of their turn.

data.name: Advance Warning
data.description: The area indicated in this turn will be attacked next turn.

data.name: Forcefield
data.description: Damage applied to units with Forcefields will first deplete the Forcefield's Deflection Value.

data.name: Assault
data.description: When an enemy unit ends its movement within the indicated area, perform an attack on it.

data.name: Extreme Recovery
data.description: If current HP is below 30% of maximum HP, recover HP to max. This effect can trigger once per battle.

data.name: Quick Movement
data.description: Increase dodge by 75% for self.

data.name: Fragile Defense
data.description: Units affected by <color=#3487e0>Vulnerable</color> take 50% more damage.

data.name: Double Increase
data.description: Increase Accuracy and Damage dealt by 50% for self.

data.name: Special Target
data.description: Attacking this target grants 3 points of Confectance Index.

data.name: Gun Control
data.description: Reduce damage dealt by 50%.

data.name: Maintain Focus
data.description: Increase critical rate for self. Upon being attacked in any way, remove this status effect.

data.name: Focused Offensive
data.description: If current HP is greater than 80% of maximum HP, increase damage dealt by 40%.

data.name: Damage Burst
data.description: Increase damage dealt by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

data.name: Vision Increase I
data.description: Increase Accuracy by 15% for all allied units.

data.name: Vision Increase II
data.description: Increase Accuracy by 30% for all allied units.

data.name: Varjager
data.description: This unit is a member of the Varjagers. Killing him grants an additional 2 points of Confectance Index.

data.name: ELID
data.description: This unit is an ELID. Killing it grants an additional 1 point of Confectance Index.

data.name: P.M.C.
data.description: This unit is a mechanical unit from a P.M.C. Killing it grants an additional 3 points of Confectance Index.

data.name: Powerful Unit
data.description: This is a powerful combat unit from an unknown faction. Killing it grants an additional 10 points of Confectance Index.

data.name: Unknown
data.description: This unit's data cannot be analyzed.

data.name: Battlefield Monitoring
data.description: If there is an enemy unit within 6 tiles, use <color=#3487e0>Assault</color> on it. This effect can trigger up to 3 times per turn.

data.name: Accurate Aim I
data.description: Increase Accuracy by 25% for self.

data.name: Accurate Aim II
data.description: Increase Accuracy by 50% for self.

data.name: Mobile Support
data.description: Thus unit performs an <color=#3487e0>Assist</color> on an enemy unit within 2 tiles. This <color=#3487e0>Assist</color> deals damage equal to attack of self. This effect can trigger up to 3 times per turn.

data.name: Second Action
data.description: Upon killing an enemy target, gain 1 instance of <color=#3487e0>Extra Action</color>. This effect can trigger up to 1 time per turn.

data.name: Continuous Damage
data.description: At the end of the turn, each stack of Continuous Damage causes the affected unit to lose part of its maximum HP. Stacks up to 5 times.

data.name: Joint Boost
data.description: Increase damage dealt by 30% if there are 2 or more allied units on the battlefield.

data.name: Reboot Pause
data.description: Before recovering to 100% HP, Darture immediately returns to the battlefield and cannot take any action.

data.name: Mobile Dodge
data.description: Increase dodge by 50% for self. If attacked by any enemy unit within 1.5 tiles, further increase dodge by 25%.

data.name: Full Court Press
data.description: Increase all allied units' damage dealt by 50%.

data.name: Death Proof
data.description: HP will not go below 1.

data.name: Extra Command
data.description: May perform multiple actions on an allied turn that are not movement. The number of actions depends on the skill being used or buff effects.

data.name: Targeted
data.description: Attacks are guaranteed to hit.

data.name: Stability Break
data.description: Mobility of self is reduced to 0 and cannot perform any actions. For the duration of this effect, stability index of self is set to 0 and Overbearing Suppression cannot be re-established.

data.name: Negative Control Effect
data.description: This unit is affected by Stun, Lost Control, Taunt, or Stability Break.

data.name: Assist Boost I
data.description: Increase damage done by Assists. Damage is increased by 40% of Krolik's attack.

data.name: Assist Boost II
data.description: Increase damage done by Assists. Damage is increased by 50% of Krolik's attack.

data.name: Visual Restriction
data.description: Accuracy of self is reduced by 100%.

data.name: Firepower Expansion I
data.description: Increase Accuracy of self by 15%.

data.name: Vector Boost I
data.description: Increases attack of self by 15% of Nemesis - ETs's attack.

data.name: Firepower Expansion II
data.description: Increase Accuracy by 25% for self.

data.name: Vector Boost II
data.description: Increases attack of self by 25% of Nemesis - ETs's attack.

data.name: Double Demolition
data.description: After using Steel Rain, gain 1 instance of <color=#3487e0>Extra Action</color>. This effect can trigger up to 1 time per turn.

data.name: Double Increase
data.description: Increase Accuracy and damage dealt of self by 15%.

data.name: Power Accumulation
data.description: Every stack of this status effect increases dodge of self by 10% and the damage of Gale Slash by 5%.

data.name: Follow-Up Shot I
data.description: If an allied unit damages an enemy unit within 9 tiles, perform 1 Assist on said enemy unit. This Assist deals damage equal to 75% of own attack. If this allied unit is Krolik, the Assist's accuracy and critical rate is increased to 100%. This effect can trigger 1 time per turn.

data.name: Follow-Up Shot II
data.description: If an allied unit damages an enemy unit within 9 tiles, perform 1 Assist on said enemy unit. This Assist deals damage equal to 100% of own attack. If this allied unit is Krolik, the Assist's accuracy and critical rate is increased to 100%. This effect can trigger 1 time per turn.

data.name: Weakpoint Sensing I
data.description: If current HP is 100%, increase damage dealt by 40%.

data.name: Weakpoint Sensing II
data.description: If current HP is greater than 80% of maximum HP, increase damage dealt by 40%.

data.name: Minimum Load
data.description: Units with the <color=#3487e0>Minimum Load</color> have their minimum HP set to 1 for the duration of the effect. When this effect expires and if the unit's HP is 1, it gains 5 points of Confectance Index.

data.name: Damage Control I
data.description: Damage received is reduced by 60%.

data.name: Damage Control II
data.description: Damage received is reduced by 80%.

data.name: Agility Assurance I
data.description: Dodge of self is increased by 15%.

data.name: Agility Assurance II
data.description: Dodge of self is increased by 20%.

data.name: Quick Movement
data.description: Increase dodge by 75% for self.

data.name: Orderless Operation
data.description: Units with the <color=#3487e0>Orderless Operation</color> status grant Vepley 5 points of Confectance Index at the start of their turn.

data.name: Fragile Defense I
data.description: Increase damage received by 20%.

data.name: Fragile Defense II
data.description: Increase damage received by 40%.

data.name: Mobile Support I
data.description: The damage of the next Assist is increased by 80% of Krolik - ETs' attack.

data.name: Mobile Support II
data.description: The damage of the next Assist is increased by 100% of Krolik - ETs' attack.

data.name: Damage Burst
data.description: Every stack of this effect increases critical rate of self by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times.

data.name: Defense Control
data.description: This unit gains 30% <color=#3487e0>Vulnerability</color>.

data.name: Hidden
data.description: Increase dodge of self by 50%.

data.name: Alert I
data.description: After killing an enemy target, gain 1 instance of <color=#3487e0>Extra Action</color>. This effect can trigger up to 1 time per turn.

data.name: Alert II
data.description: After killing an enemy target or causing an enemy target to enter <color=#3487e0>Stability Break</color>, gain 1 instance of <color=#3487e0>Extra Action</color>. This effect can trigger up to 1 time per turn.

data.name: Visual Interference I
data.description: Each stack of this condition decreases Accuracy by 15% for self. Stacks infinitely.

data.name: Visual Interference II
data.description: Each stack of this condition decreases Accuracy by 12% for self. Stacks infinitely.

data.name: Charge
data.description: Each stack of this condition increases damage dealt by 5% for self. Stacks up to 40 times.

data.name: Continuous Damage
data.description: At the end of the turn, each stack of <color=#3487e0>Continuous Damage</color> causes the affected unit to lose 5% of their maximum HP as <r<kinetic>> damage. Stacks up to 5 times.

data.name: Area Counterattack
data.description: Upon taking an attack from an enemy unit within a 3 to 6 tile radius around self, trigger 1 instance of <color=#3487e0>Counterattack</color>. <color=#3487e0>Counterattack</color> deals damage equal to 100% of attack. This effect can trigger up to 1 time per turn.

data.name: Double Pierce
data.description: When hit by a Thorn Shot, take damage equal to 50% of the Mishap Thorn's attack.

data.name: Power Up I
data.description: Increase damage dealt by 30%.

data.name: Power Up II
data.description: Increase damage dealt by 80%.

data.name: Power Up III
data.description: Increase damage dealt by 150%.

data.name: All Ahead Full
data.description: Mobility increased by 150.

data.name: Multiphase Enhancement
data.description: Increase attack of self by 50%.

data.name: Extreme Recovery I
data.description: At the start of the turn, if current HP is greater than 1 and less than or equal to 30% of maximum HP, cleanses all debuffs on self. This effect can trigger once per battle. As long as this effect has not triggered, Vepley - ETs is under the Death Proof status.

data.name: Extreme Recovery II
data.description: At the start of the turn, if current HP is less than or equal to 30% of maximum HP, recover 30% of maximum HP and dispel all debuffs on self. This effect can trigger once per battle. As long as this effect has not triggered, Vepley - ETs is under the Death Proof status.

data.name: Quick Draw
data.description: If an enemy unit attempts an attack within this unit's attack range or within a specific area, perform an attack on the enemy unit.

data.name: Pack Tactics
data.description: If an enemy unit is attacked by a monster of the same type within this unit's range, perform an attack on the enemy unit in question.

data.name: Immobilized
data.description: Unable to move.

data.name: Afraid
data.description: Cannot be controlled and attempts to move away from the unit that inflicted this condition.

data.name: Seduced
data.description: Cannot be controlled and attempts to move toward from the unit that inflicted this condition.

data.name: Burning II
data.description: At the end of this unit's action, this unit is damaged for 50% of the attack of the attacker. If this unit's stability index is being drained, it is immediately damaged for 150% of the attack of the attacker and its stability index is additionally decreased by 50% of the attacker's Suppression Strength.

data.name: Burning Area
data.description: At the end of both allied and enemy turns, all units within this area take damage equal to 50% of the inflictor's attack and have Burning II applied to them.

data.name: Paralysis
data.description: Can only move or Stand By.

data.name: Lava
data.description: Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to units which end their movement in this area for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Enemy units in this area gain a weakness to <color=#e67129>Burning</color> damage and Burning tiles.

data.name: Tideway
data.description: Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to units which end their movement in this area for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Enemy units in this area gain a weakness to <color=#e67129>Hydro</color> damage. Considered a Hydro tile.

data.name: Frost
data.description: Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to units which end their movement in this area for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Enemy units in this area gain a weakness to <color=#e67129>Freeze</color> damage and Freeze tiles.

data.name: Swamp
data.description: Deal fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>20%</color> of own attack to enemy units which end their turn in this area. Apply a weakness to <color=#8679e8>Corrosion</color> to enemy units in this area. At the start of every <color=#f26c1c>2nd turn</color>, the <color=#3487e0>Swamp</color> spreads <color=#f26c1c>1 tile in each direction</color>. This is considered a Corrosion tile.

data.name: Electrified
data.description: Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to units which end their movement in this area for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Enemy units in this area gain a weakness to <color=#e67129>Electric</color> damage and Electric tiles.

data.name: Flesh Vine
data.description: Can act immediately after summoning.

data.name: Support Action
data.description: Performs a Support Attack; cannot be triggered by another Support Attack.

data.name: Counterattack
data.description: Performs an attack; cannot be triggered by Interceptions, Counterattacks or Support Attacks.

data.name: Interception
data.description: Performs an attack; cannot be triggered by Interceptions, Counterattacks or Support Attacks.

data.name: Emergency Support
data.description: Performs a Support Attack.

data.name: Secret Armor
data.description: When the armor is spawned and at the start of the enemy's turn, deals AoE Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>50%</color> of attack to all enemy units within a <color=#f26c1c>3×3 area</color> and randomly applies <color=#f26c1c>1</color> debuff for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>.

data.name: Standard Armor
data.description: Disappears immediately upon being hit by <color=#3487e0>Control II</color> and absorbs the obtained <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>.

data.name: Voltage
data.description: Adds <color=#d4ae08>Electric</color> weakness to enemy units in the area. When enemy units on the affected tiles suffer AoE damage, a tile reaction is triggered, dealing fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>30%</color> of attack, and removes the tile effect. If the AoE damage is <color=#d4ae08>Electric</color> or <color=#2caadb>Hydro</color>, the fixed damage increases to <color=#f26c1c>60%</color> of attack. Deals <color=#f26c1c>double</color> damage to large targets. Considered an Electric tile.

data.name: Incapaciation
data.description: Performs an attack which ends the target's movement. Cannot trigger Support Action, Interception, or Counterattack.

data.name: Extra Action
data.description: Includes <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, <color=#3487e0>Extra Movement</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>.

data.name: Shield
data.description: Absorbs a certain amount of damage. Shields do not stack, but they can overlap. When the most recently-applied shield has a longer duration or takes more damage than the previous one(s), it replaces the previous one(s). Shields include <color=#3487e0>Frost Barrier</color>, <color=#3487e0>Capital Protection</color> and other effects.

data.name: Hole
data.description: At the start of the turn, Sneaker Crysmoles will always emerge from their <color=#3487e0>caves</color>; positioning a unit on top of a <color=#3487e0>cave</color> entrance prevents Sneaker Crysmoles from emerging through it. For every <color=#3487e0>cave</color> that is not blocked by a unit, Sneaker Crysmoles gain <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>.

data.name: Final Damage
data.description: The final damage total obtained after factoring damage boosts, damage reduction and other effects.

data.name: Flame
data.description: Applies a weakness to <color=#e67129>Burning</color> to enemy units within the area. Deal <color=#f26c1c>99,998 points</color> of fixed damage to enemy units which end their movement within this area. This effect is considered a Burning tile.

data.name: Willpower Drain
data.description: At the end of the action, the afflicted unit takes <color=#f26c1c>4 points</color> of fixed stability damage and reduces max HP by <color=#f26c1c>20%</color>. When the unit that applies this status dies, <color=#3487e0>Willpower Drain</color> is nullified and the max HP reduced by <color=#3487e0>Willpower Drain</color> is restored. This effect cannot be cleansed.

data.name: Flesh Vine
data.description: Stands by for <color=#f26c1c>1</color> turn after being born, acts normally thereafter.

data.name: Multi-Cell Grid
data.description: Applies <color=#f26c1c>2</color> random elemental debuffs to enemy units which end their turn in the area for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>. Enemy units on this terrain gain weakness to all elements.

data.name: Security Monitoring
data.description: At the end of this unit's action, perform Surveillance on the entire map. When an enemy unit uses a basic attack or an active attack, damage them for <color=#f26c1c>40%</color> of own attack. This effect can trigger <color=#f26c1c>1 time</color> per turn.

data.name: Arthrorhynchus
data.description: Recover HP of self at the end of the turn.

data.name: Fetumor
data.description: Periodically applies a shield to all allied units, try killing it first.

data.name: Retorhynchus
data.description: Splits off another Snakethorn at the end of the turn.

data.name: Raditumor
data.description: Periodically damages all allied units, try killing it first.

data.name: Mucus
data.description: When an enemy unit is damaged while standing on a <color=#3487e0>Slime</color> tile, apply <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to that unit for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>. data.description: Unable to move. Inflicts <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> on all enemy units upon death. If still active after 1 turn, it will be absorbed by Fortress Titan, removing all its debuffs and apply <color=#3487e0>{2}</color> equal to the stacks of <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> on self.

Enemy units that remain on <color=#3487e0>Mucus</color> at the end of their turn deal <color=#f26c1c>30%</color> less damage. Damage taken by Terrorhorn Chimera on <color=#3487e0>Mucus</color> is increased by <color=#f26c1c>40%</color>.

data.description: Cannot die. At the end of the round, triggers a self detonation and deals AoE <color=#8679e8>Corrosion Damage</color> that ignores Cover equal to <color=#f26c1c>40%</color> of HP lost to all allied units.

data.name: Pathcutter Bomb I
data.description: When this unit stops moving or at the end of this unit's action, deals corresponding phase damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>120%</color> of attack to all enemy units within <color=#f26c1c>a cross-shaped area 5 tiles wide</color>.

data.name: Pathcutter Bomb II
data.description: When this unit stops moving or at the end of this unit's action, deals corresponding phase damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>180%</color> of attack to all enemy units within <color=#f26c1c>a cross-shaped area 8 tiles wide</color>, and also applies 1 stack of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>1 turn</color>.

data.name: Phase Demolition

(Does not trigger support attacks or other such effects)

data.name: All-Range Pathcutter Bomb
data.description: Inherits <color=#f26c1c>300%</color> of the summoner's current attack. When the summoner's side's turn ends, deals AoE fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>3000%</color> of attack to all enemy units on the battlefield.

data.name: Fertilizer Scholar
data.description: Considered a summoned unit. Inherits <color=#f26c1c>200%</color> of the summoner's attack and <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of the summoner's other base stats.

data.name: Patrol Supervisor
data.description: Considered a summoned unit. Its initial HP is <color=#f26c1c>1000 points</color>, initial attack and defense are <color=#f26c1c>1</color>.

data.name: Victory Protocol

data.name: Perplexed Reflex
data.description: Deals Physical damage. After using this skill, Lainie will perform the basic attack <color=#3487e0>Victory Protocol</color> on the target.

data.name: Combat Algorithm
data.description: Deals Physical damage. If <color=#3487e0>Simulacrum</color> is on the field, after usage of this skill, <color=#3487e0>Simulacrum</color> uses the active skill <color=#3487e0>Offense Simulation</color> centered on itself. If it does not hit the target of <color=#3487e0>Combat Algorithm</color>, it ignores part of the target's defense.

data.name: Offense Simulation
data.description: Selects 1 enemy target within <color=#f26c1c>7 tiles</color> and deals AoE Physical damage to the target and all enemy units within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of it. The damage multiplier is reduced depending on the number of targets hit. If an enemy target's defense is <color=#f26c1c>0 or less</color> and Lainie used the skill <color=#3487e0>Combat Algorithm</color> on the current turn, it ignores part of the target's defense. After using this skill, Lainie uses the active skill <color=#3487e0>Combat Algorithm</color> on the selected target.

data.name: Combat Algorithm
data.description: Deals physical damage. If the enemy target's defense is <color=#f26c1c>0 or less</color>, critical damage dealt is increased. Before the attack resolves, applies <color=#3487e0>Parapluie's Penetration</color>. If <color=#3487e0>Simulacrum</color> is on the field, after using this skill, the <color=#3487e0>Simulacrum</color> uses the active skill <color=#3487e0>Offense Simulation</color> centered on itself. If it does not hit the target of <color=#3487e0>Combat Algorithm</color>, it ignores part of the target's defense.

data.name: Offense Simulation

If an enemy target's defense is <color=#f26c1c>0 or less</color>, then any critical damage dealt to it is increased, and when Lainie uses <color=#3487e0>Combat Algorithm</color>, it ignores part of the target's defense. After using this skill, Lainie uses the active skill <color=#3487e0>Combat Algorithm</color> on the selected target.

data.name: Computational Crush
data.description:
Deals AoE Physical damage to the target and all enemy units within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of it. 
If <color=#3487e0>Simulacrum</color> is on the field, after using this skill, <color=#3487e0>Simulacrum</color> performs the active skill <color=#3487e0>Hashrate Overclock</color> centered on herself and applies <color=#3487e0>Movement Down I</color>.

data.name: Hashrate Overclock
data.description: Deals AoE Physical damage to all enemy units within <color=#f26c1c>3 tiles</color> of the target tile. If <color=#f26c1c>2 or fewer</color> enemy units are hit, stability damage dealt is increased when Lainie uses the active skill <color=#3487e0>Computational Crush</color> on this turn. After using this skill, Lainie uses the active skill <color=#3487e0>Computational Crush</color> on the selected tile.

data.name: Simulacrum
data.description: A clone of Lainie that can be independently controlled. Inherits all of Lainie's stats and equipment effects. When directing Lainie or her Simulacrum to make an active attack, the other will automatically use the corresponding skill to attack the selected target. If the auto-targeting fails, then the other can use the corresponding skill once on their action. This does not trigger loops.

data.name: Arios
data.description: Considered a Summoned Creature. Inherits <color=#f26c1c>120%</color> of Florence's initial max HP, <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of her initial attack, and <color=#f26c1c>120%</color> of her initial defense. Can apply <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to enemy units, take damage in Florence's place, and after it or Florence is damaged, it will perform a <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>.

data.name: Gravity Oscillation
data.description: Deals AoE physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>90%</color> of attack to all enemy targets and knocks them back by <color=#f26c1c>4 tiles</color>.

data.name: Sentry Mode
data.description:
Final damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>60%</color>.
At the start of the turn, summons <color=#f26c1c>2 sentries</color>. Selects the enemy target with <color=#f26c1c>the highest attack</color> and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to it for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>.

data.name: Leap Mode
data.description:
Final damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>99%</color>.
At the start of the round, summons <color=#f26c1c>2 sentries</color>. At the start of the turn, cleanses <color=#f26c1c>1 debuff</color>, gains a Shield with an absorption strength equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of max HP. At the end of the turn, performs <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>.
After the mission, switches from <color=#f26c1c>Leap Mode</color> to <color=#f26c1c>Sentry Mode</color>.

data.name: Gravity Oscillation
data.description: Deals AoE physical damage to all enemy targets equal to <color=#f26c1c>120%</color> of attack, applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> for 2 <color=#f26c1c>2</color> turns, and knocks the target back by <color=#f26c1c>4</color> tiles.

data.name: Sentry Mode
data.description:
Final damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>80%</color> and mobility is increased by <color=#f26c1c>1 tile</color>.
At the start of the turn, summons <color=#f26c1c>3 sentries</color>. Selects the enemy target with <color=#f26c1c>the highest attack</color> and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to it for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color>.

data.name: Leap Mode
data.description:
Final damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>99%</color> and mobility is increased by <color=#f26c1c>1 tile</color>.
At the start of the round, summons <color=#f26c1c>3 Fortress Devices</color>. At the start of the turn, cleanses <color=#f26c1c>2 debuffs</color> from self and gains a Shield equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of max HP. At the end of the turn, performs <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>.
When the mission is complete, switches from <color=#f26c1c>Leap Mode</color> to <color=#f26c1c>Sentry Mode</color>.

data.name: Backtrack Code
data.description: Damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>90%</color>. At the start of the turn, recover HP equal to <color=#f26c1c>8%</color> of max HP. This buff cannot be cleansed.

data.description: Applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> to allied units (excluding Yoohee).

data.description: Effect depends on the firstly applied <color=#f26c1c>3</color> <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>; <color=#f26c1c>Each</color> <color=#3487e0>Graceful Spin</color> heals all allied units on the battlefield for <color=#f26c1c>15%</color> of max HP, <color=#f26c1c>each</color> <color=#3487e0>Passionate Spin</color> cleanses <color=#f26c1c>1</color> debuff from all allied units on the battlefield (If <color=#3487e0>Best Dancer</color> has already been triggered this turn, Yoohee will not play the dancing animation but the skill effect will still take place).

data.name: Liquid N2 Fang
data.description: Applies <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> to enemy units within <color=#f26c1c>4 tiles</color> of it. Before enemy units within its range are attacked, if they do not have <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, removes an amount of their HP equal to <color=#f26c1c>500%</color> of Alva's attack and convert it to an equal amount of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>. This cannot reduce their HP below <color=#f26c1c>1 point</color> and it can be triggered up to <color=#f26c1c>1 time</color> per enemy unit per round. A maximum of <color=#f26c1c>1</color> Liquid N2 Fang can exist at any one time.
